name: Vertically scroll rss feed
author: Gopi Ramasamy

sections.description:
This plugin scroll the RSS feed title vertically in the widget, admin can add/update the RSS link and style via widget management.

Check official website for live demo : http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2010/07/18/vertically-scroll-rss-feed/

  • Live Demo : Live demo
  • More Information : More Information
  • User Comments : User Comments

Vertically scroll rss feed wordpress plugin will create the scroll news in the website widget. We can provide the rss feed as a input for this scroll. That is, This plugin read the given rss feed and create the vertical scroll with rss feed title. We can use only one rss feed at a time.

Features of this plugine

  • Easy installation.
  • Can add any RSS feed.
  • Easy style-override system.
  • Scrolling, So occupy less space.

What is rss? RSS (Really Simple Syndication) is a family of web feed formats used to publish frequently updated works—such as blog entries, news headlines.

Plugin configuration

  • Drag and drop the widget.

  • Add directly in the theme.

http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2010/07/18/vertically-scroll-rss-feed/

Translators

  • English (en_EN) – Gopi Ramasamy
  • Polish (pl_PL) – Abdul Sattar
sections.installation: Installation Instruction and Configuration check this link : http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2010/07/18/vertically-scroll-rss-feed/
sections.faq:
1. Can I add more then one RSS feed at same time?

  2. Can I change the Slide Direction?

  3. Can I customize the all other appearance style?

  4. Why my news content out of range?

  5. Can I change the scroll manner from vertical to horizontal?

Answer

1.0

This is the first version.
